sentences.english: Punta del Este and Montevideo , the capital is a major tourist destination.
sentences.chinese: 埃斯特角和首都蒙得维的亚是主要旅游地。

sentences.english: He was born in Montevideo, Uruguay to Román Vi?oly Barreto, (a film and theater director) and Maria Beceiro (a mathematics teacher).
